sentences.en: 'But you are not English,'said the wood - sawyer,'though you wear English dress?'
sentences.cn: “ 可你不是英国人, ”锯木工问, “ 虽然你一身英国装. ”

sentences.en: " I'll thank you to keep yourself to yourself, Mr. Thomas Sawyer.
sentences.cn: “ 托马斯-索亚先生, 你自己好自为之吧,我这先谢谢你了.

sentences.en: " Tom Sawyer, the Black Avenger of the Spanish Main.
sentences.cn: “ 我乃西班牙海黑衣侠盗,汤姆-索亚.

sentences.en: " Well, Tom Sawyer he licked me once. "
sentences.cn: “ 哦, 汤姆-索亚揍过我一回. ”

sentences.en: MONDAY morning found Tom Sawyer miserable.
sentences.cn: 星期一早晨,汤姆-索亚很难受.

sentences.en: Mr. Sawyer comes home from work.
Mr. Sawyer goes to work and the children go to school.
sentences.cn: 索耶先生去上班,孩子们去上学.

sentences.en: Oh, I know. It's Thomas Sawyer. "
sentences.cn: 哦, 我知道, 你叫托马斯-索亚. ”

sentences.en: Pity but somebody could find Tom Sawyer!
sentences.cn: 可遗憾的是没人能找到汤姆-索亚!

sentences.en: Professor Sawyer was formally installed as President last Thursday.
sentences.cn: 索耶教授上周四被正式任命为校长。

sentences.en: Tom Sawyer was in the skiff that bore Judge Thatcher.
sentences.cn: 汤姆-索亚和撒切尔法官同乘一条小艇.

sentences.en: Tom Sawyer's Gang -- It'sounds splendid, don't it, Huck? "
sentences.cn: 汤姆-索亚这名字挺响的, 是不是, 哈克? ”

sentences.en: Was it Tom Sawyer that found it? "
sentences.cn: 那是汤姆-索亚发现的 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: What is Mr. Sawyer doing tonight?
sentences.cn: 索耶先生今晚正在做 什么 ?

sentences.en: Why, they'd say,'Mph! Tom Sawyer's Gang ! pretty low characters in it!'
sentences.cn: 他们会不屑一顾地说: 瞧 汤姆-索亚那帮乌合之众, 全是些 低贱 的人.

phrases.tran_cn: 汤姆历险记，汤姆·索亚历险记；汤姆·索亚

trans.tran_cn: 锯木匠，漂流水中的树木，显赫天牛（其幼虫钻木为穴）
trans.tran_en: a person who saws timber for a living
